comments.author: lisaiscooking
comments.content: I love the mix of colors and textures with these ingredients. Wish this were my lunch!

comments.author: David {Green Kitchen Stories}
comments.content: I will try this recipe in a near future. I know that because we eat vegetable tortillas and tacos pretty often and I'm starting to get quite tired of our own versions. I haven't heard of achiote but I'll look it up. Thanks for the recipe!

comments.author: renee
comments.content: Yum! I might have to try this one!

comments.author: Deborah Soffel
comments.content: Thanks for this great recipe. I have posted it on my blog with a wine pairing. I rave about how great you are :-)

comments.author: Daniel@ The Food Addicts
comments.content: Great alternative to meat. With all those flavors combined they must taste great!

comments.author: Kelly
comments.content:
This looks delicious, but I am from Australia and cant find achiote anywhere! Can you recommend a replacement? Saffron?

Thanks!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: I hear a lot from Aussie readers that can't find ingredients, I'm starting to think you guys are deprived down there :). Let's see, in a pinch if I had to make fake achiote I'd use either saffron or turmeric for the color and then probably lemon juice or tamarind for the tang. Actually, dried mango powder might be kind of a good sub - it is called amchoor and is available in Indian groceries.

comments.author: Lea
comments.content: this was my contribution to a birthday celebration today - a fantastic choice! Delicious!!

comments.author: jennifer
comments.content:
these look so good, i love the use of annatto for color and flavor! i added these to: http://fuckyeahvegantacos.tumblr.com/post/17328096963/from-herbivoracious-grilled-tofu-and-pepper

xotaco!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Haha! I'm glad to be included in such august company, and once again raise the MPAA rating for my site :)

comments.author: jennifer
comments.content: You're very welcome! Herbivoracious is for everyone :)
